mapper.select: SELECT cs.svr_cust_no svrno , cc.cust_name custname, cs.svr_title svrtitle, cs.svr_create_date createtime ,su.usr_name createname from cst_service cs INNER JOIN cst_customer cc ON cs.svr_cust_no = cc.cust_no INNER JOIN sys_user su ON cs.svr_create_id = su.usr_id

SELECT cs.svr_cust_no svrno , cc.cust_name custname, cs.svr_title svrtitle, cs.svr_create_date createtime ,su.usr_name createname ,sus.usr_name distributename ,cs.svr_due_date distributedate ,cs.svr_deal_date dealdate ,cs.svr_result result from cst_service cs INNER JOIN cst_customer cc ON cs.svr_cust_no = cc.cust_no INNER JOIN sys_user su ON cs.svr_create_id = su.usr_id INNER JOIN sys_user sus ON cs.svr_due_id = sus.usr_id where cs.svr_cust_no = #{no}
